channel.title: Google Sites on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in Google Sites on Damien Saunders

item.title: ZOHO CRM just integrated with Google Sites
item.description: ZOHO CRMis one of the best web based SaaS customer relationship managementweb apps around and now its gone and made it even easier to capture your leads or enquiries from your website – if you use Google Sites.Currently Social CRM is the new name for managing customers – CRM wasn’t good enough and wasn’t work for many. The new tag Social CRM refers to engaging customers online where ever they are and hopefully that’s on your website!
